alert.note: Alert for Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 12:44PM CDT until October 24 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Shawano County in northeastern Wisconsin... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1244 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Shawano, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Shawano, Belle Plaine, Bonduel, Cecil, Green Valley, Pulcifer, Lunds, Advance, Zachow, and Shawano Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
